org.hibernate.ogm.cfg

Class OgmConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration
      • org.hibernate.ogm.cfg.OgmConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OgmConfiguration
extends Configuration
    An instance of OgmConfiguration allows the application to specify properties and mapping documents to be used when creating an OgmSessionFactory.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • OGM_ON

        public static final String OGM_ON
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OGM_QUERY_PARSER_SERVICE

        public static final String OGM_QUERY_PARSER_SERVICE
        Name of the configuration option for specifying the QueryParserService to be used. Accepts a fully-qualified class name. If not specified, the parser type returned by ogm.datastore.spi.DatastoreProvider.DatastoreProvider will be used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
